name: fli-so
description: fli.so is a self-hosted link-shortener tool that provides advanced redirecting options, detailed analytics, and branded domains. Targeted at small businesses and creators who want link tracking and campaign control.
features: URL Shortener: Advanced link shortening, Detailed analytics, Branded domains. Professional link management.
Campaign Tracking: Monitor link performance. Marketing insights.
Custom Domains: Use your own branding. Professional appearance.
Analytics: Track clicks and referrers. Data-driven decisions.
QR Codes: Generate codes for links. Mobile-friendly sharing.
Link Expiration: Set automatic deactivation. Temporary campaigns.
Password Protection: Secure sensitive links. Controlled access.
Geographic Tracking: See where clicks come from. Regional insights.
API Access: Integrate with tools. Automation-ready.
